title: Course: Data Visualisation and Analytics
notes: Master's and Honours' course for Computer Science programmes at Heriot-Watt University, teaching Data Visualisations, Data Analytics and Data Storytelling. With my experience in building a similar course, I have modernised the course material and provided more guided tutorials for the practical part of the course.

title: Course: Software Engineering Foundations
notes: Master's course for Computer Science programmes at Heriot-Watt University, teaching the foundations of Object-Oriented Programming. As course leader, I also redesigned the practical assessments to emphasize the importance of Software Engineering practices to students, by encouraging iterative development in the assessment design itself.

title: Course: Foundations of Software Design and Development
notes: First year course for Computing students at Edinburgh Napier University, teaching the fundamentals of algorithms and software design.

title: Course: Interactive Data Visualisation
notes: Third year course for Data Science students at Edinburgh Napier University, teaching the theory behind visualising data (numerical, categorical, temporal, geographical and relational) and using interactivity to handle complexity. It also strongly emphasises on putting this knowledge to practice by developing interactive data visualisation dashboards with D3.js.

title: Course: Information Systems Engineering
notes: Master course for Computing students at Edinburgh Napier University, teaching the analysis, modelling and basic implementation of systems from a set of requirements.

title: Course: Data Analytics (Blended)
notes: Master course for Data Science students at Edinburgh Napier University, teaching the fundamentals of cleaning, mining and visualising data for analysis.

title: Course: Data Management and Processing (Online)
notes: Master course for Data Engineering students at Edinburgh Napier University, teaching the engineering practices behind creating robust and scalable data analysis pipelines.

title: Invited Talk: Data Cleaning
notes: Part of the Professional Learning Programme for Colleges (organised by the Edinburgh Data-Driven Innovation (DDI) City Deal project)
This session exposed Edinburgh Colleges' staff to the principles of data cleaning and data quality, followed by a practical demonstration with Open Refine.

title: Blog Post: D3 + Tippy = Easy Tooltips on Your Visualisations
notes: Tutorial on how to integrate Tippy.js within a D3.js project to enable tooltips on visualisations.

title: Blog Post: Setting Up a JavaScript Build Process using Rollup
notes: Instructions on how set up a building process for JavaScript modules, exploring bundling, linting, transpiling, and minifying.

title: Blog Post: Want to learn D3? Let's make a bar chart!
notes: A small tutorial exploring basic notions of D3 by creating a bar chart.

title: Invited Talk: Document Preparation and Tools
notes: Lecture given to honours students to help them prepare their dissertation document, and present them a LaTeX template for it.

title: Invited Talk: Introduction to Topic Models
notes: Lecture given to Data Visualisation and Analytics students, introducing them the core concepts of topic models.
